summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for the account of an individual or entity, detailing transactions for the period from February 1, 2014, to February 28, 2014. It includes information on deposits, service charges, and interest earned, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the statement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document details account transactions for February 2014, including a beginning balance of $166,233.16 and an ending balance of $166,259.94.
The account incurred service charges of $50.00 during the statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $25.50, with a year-to-date total of $53.96.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in the account statement within 60 days.
There are references to confidential information and legal protections under Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure.
